privacyModal.title: Privacy Policy 🔒
privacyModal.message:
Effective Date: July 2025

Polyglot Translator Privacy Policy

We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data.

📱 INFORMATION WE COLLECT:
• Translation text (processed temporarily)
• App usage preferences (stored locally)
• No personal identifying information

🔒 HOW WE USE YOUR DATA:
• Process translations via secure API
• Improve app functionality
• Store favorites/history locally on your device

🤝 THIRD-PARTY SERVICES:
• Claude AI: Translation processing only
• Google AdMob: Anonymous advertising (if applicable)
• No data shared for other purposes

👤 YOUR RIGHTS:
• Access your data
• Delete your data anytime
• Opt-out of ads

📧 CONTACT:
yongjae.kim.dev@gmail.com

For questions about this policy, please contact us via email.
